summary: Frontend testing completed for Admin Dashboard document display and approval features. All 5 requested features verified successfully: Admin login, property sales documents display, rental documents display, property sale approval with notification, and rental approval with notification.
critical_code_review_comments: Documents display implementation is correct - shows titre_foncier, document_ministere_habitat, document_batiment with checkmarks for uploaded docs and 'Non fourni' for missing docs
Approval buttons (Approuver/Rejeter) correctly appear for pending properties and rentals
Notification system is implemented - notifications are created in db.notifications when admin approves/rejects
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin dashboard document display and approval features are working correctly. Property sales show Documents Légaux section with titre_foncier, document_ministere_habitat, document_batiment. Rentals show similar documents section. Approval creates notifications for property owners.

admin_login.details: Successfully logged in with admin/admin123 credentials

property_sales_tab.details: Ventes Immo tab shows 12 property sales with statuses: Approuvé, Rejeté, En attente, Vendu

property_sale_documents_display.details: Documents Légaux section displays: Titre Foncier, Document Ministère de l'Habitat, Document du Bâtiment, Pièce d'Identité Vendeur, Autres Documents, Documents Admin with upload button

rental_documents_display.details: Documents Légaux section displays: Titre Foncier, Enregistrement Ministère, Document du Bâtiment, Pièce d'Identité Propriétaire

property_sale_approval.details: Clicked Approuver button on pending property 'Test Villa', status changed to 'Approuvé - Visible sur le site', toast notification 'Vente immobilière approuvée !' shown

rental_approval.details: Clicked Approuver button on pending rental 'belle appartment', toast notification 'Annonce approuvée avec succès !' shown

notification_creation.details: Backend code at lines 2637, 2675, 4083, 4121 creates notifications in db.notifications when admin approves/rejects properties and rentals
